data.name: Quadratic puzzle 5
data.detailed_description:
Game introduction

The gameplay is a traditional jigsaw puzzle, which requires splicing the disrupted pieces into a complete image. Every time you complete it, your fastest completion time will be recorded, come and challenge your limit speed!

Featured Content

  • Every time a puzzle is completed, images of beautiful girls with different personalities will be presented.
  • Full-time one-handed mode, perfect for playing at leisure.
  • A total of 25 levels, each level is a different beautiful girl image waiting for you to unlock!
  • 5 different puzzle modes.
  • You can use "w,a,s,d" and the mouse wheel to control the viewing angle of the image.

data.short_description: "Quadratic puzzle 5" is a puzzle puzzle game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window 7/10
  • Processor: intel core i3-3220
  • Memory: 300 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 280
  • Storage: 195 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: The puzzle images used in the game contain female nudity, sexual intercourse and other adult content.
